message.content: {"given_definition_quality":80,"better_definition":"boy (child who is male)","sentence":"男孩儿走路。","image_prompt":"A young boy with short hair walks calmly along a street. He is alone, in simple clothes, and the background is a soft, animated apocalyptic cityscape, with muted colors, gentle lighting, and abandoned buildings giving a quiet, surreal atmosphere. The style is soft apocalypse animation, focusing on a sense of calm discovery and innocence.","sentence_translation":"The boy walks."}
